name: social_preview
description: Open Graph images for social media sharing - bold, eye-catching
base_prompt: social media preview image, bold colors, high contrast, eye-catching design, centered subject, clean background
negative_prompt: text, watermark, low quality, blurry, cluttered, too detailed, busy background
alt_text_instructions: Briefly describe the main visual element and its connection to the content being shared. Keep it under 100 characters for social platforms.
